alaska_2022: This was a special election to fill the seat vacated by Don Young.
Notable for its widely publicized Condorcet failure. Begich beat every other candidate head-to-head but was eliminated first in IRV.
mn_ward2_2021: This election featured a Condorcet cycle among the top candidates.
The cycle was: Worlobah > Arab > Gordon > Worlobah.
nyc_2025_mayor: Add notes about this election here.
